name: Catch apple
description:
Catch 10 apples in the fastest time possible ! Can you get a time below 8 seconds ?

The best time is saved and can be displayed by pressing the "Hi" button in the main menu.

Controls :

Press the "i" button on the bottom-left in the main menu to show the controls. 

Press the Orange button on the bottom-right in the main menu to switch beetween AZERTY and QWERTY mode.
